name: Stunts above Clouds 2
description:
Whoever said only airplanes can soar through the skies clearly hadn't experienced the adrenaline rush of Stunts above Clouds 2. Brace yourself for an exhilarating adventure as you take on our latest version, featuring 20 heart-pounding stages designed to push your limits like never before.

Your mission remains unchanged, but the stakes are higher and the challenges more intense. Take the driver's seat of a high-powered car and navigate through treacherous roads where every twist and turn demands unwavering control. One wrong move could spell disaster, but for the fearless daredevils among us, the thrill is irresistible.

Are you ready to defy gravity and conquer the impossible? With 20 electrifying levels, mind-bending stunts, and the added excitement of collecting money along the way, this is not a journey for the faint of heart. Are you crazy enough to make it to the end and claim your victory?

Game Features:
- 20 adrenaline-pumping levels
- Insane stunts that will leave you breathless
- Collect money to unlock even more daring challenges
